MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML12 postcode area of Biggar. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:19am. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our emergency response team have arrived onsite near Elvin Wood to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6am. When we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated 4:50am on 13th November
